document_data.name: Runa Vokdottir
document_data.mainbody: '''Runa Vokdottir''' was a member of the [[Stone-Cold Reavers]], a group of reckless adventurers who made their living sometimes as sellswords and sometimes as brigands.
document_data.Description: Runa was a muscular woman. She had black hair and cold blue eyes.
document_data.Personality: Runa knew nothing but violence to solve her problems and considered cruelty to be normal. She was a taciturn person but when she talked, her bitter sarcasm became apparent.
document_data.History: Runa grew up in the harsh north of [[Icewind Dale]]. Later, she traveled south where she joined the Stone-Cold Reavers. The group tried to steal the presumed treasure hoard of the young [[white dragon]] [[Cryovain]] from its lair, [[Icespire Hold]]. However, Cryovain hadn't amassed any treasure yet.
